mainScreen.logoutMessage: Are you sure you want to log out?
mainScreen.noVehiclesMessage: You need to add at least one vehicle before creating a statement.

vehicles.title: My Vehicles
vehicles.noVehiclesSubtitle: Add your first vehicle to get started
vehicles.noVehiclesForSelection: No vehicles available to select. Please add a vehicle first from the vehicles screen.
vehicles.deleteConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this vehicle?
vehicles.restrictedAccessMessage: Restricted access: Only 1 vehicle available via shared link

statements.title: My Statements
statements.deleteConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this statement?
statements.submitConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to submit this statement? You won't be able to edit it after submission.
statements.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this statement? This action cannot be undone.
statements.cannotEditSubmitted: This statement has already been submitted and cannot be edited.
statements.submitConfirmation: Are you sure you want to submit this statement? Once submitted, it cannot be edited.

camera.title: Camera
camera.permissionMessage: We need access to your camera to take photos for your claim.
camera.permissionDescription: Camera access is required to take photos for documentation
camera.photoSavedDescription: Your photo has been saved successfully
camera.idMessage: Take a photo of your ID document
camera.licenseMessage: Take a photo of your driving license
camera.registrationMessage: Take a photo of your vehicle registration document

damage.title: Damage Assessment
damage.instructions: Take photos of the damage from multiple angles
damage.generalDescription: Take photos of your vehicle from all angles
damage.selectVehicleFirst: Please select a vehicle first before starting damage assessment
damage.needMorePhotos: Please take at least 3 photos to complete the assessment
damage.assessmentCompleteMsg: Are you sure you want to complete the damage assessment? This will finalize your documentation.
damage.instructionsText: Document all damage to your vehicle by taking clear photos. Start with general overview photos, then focus on specific damage areas, and finally photograph any relevant documents.
damage.documentsInstructions: Take clear photos of required documents
damage.selectAreasInstructions: Tap on damaged areas of the vehicle
damage.tapAreasToSelect: Tap the red circles to select damaged areas
damage.selectAreasDescription: Please select at least one damaged area
damage.generalInstructions: Take photos from all sides of the vehicle (front, rear, left, right, etc.)
damage.damageInstructions: Take close-up photos of all damaged areas
damage.photosRequiredDescription: You'll need to take photos for {{count}} selected area(s)

statementFirstScreen.title: Did the event occur recently?
statementFirstScreen.description: Are you at the location and close to the time of the event? eClaims Solution can help you complete the data
statementFirstScreen.modalTitle: How much time has passed since the event?
statementFirstScreen.modalDescription: You have 24 hours from the time of the accident to complete an amicable agreement or to present yourself to the nearest traffic police station

main.title: Porsche E-Claims
main.logoutConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to log out?

statementTime.title: Event Time
statementTime.description: Select the exact date and time when the incident occurred. This information is crucial for processing your claim.
statementTime.note1: The event time must be within 48 hours before or 24 hours after the current time
statementTime.note2: Be as precise as possible with the timing for accurate claim processing
statementTime.note3: You may need to provide additional documentation for events outside normal timeframes
statementTime.tooFarPast: The selected time is too far in the past. Please select a time within the last 48 hours.
statementTime.tooFarFuture: The selected time is too far in the future. Please select a time within the next 24 hours.

activateGPS.title: Location Permission
activateGPS.alertBody: Location access is required for this feature. Please enable location services to continue.
activateGPS.description: We need to know where the incident occurred to process your claim accurately.

statementLocation.useLocation: Which location would you like to use?
statementLocation.enterAddress: Please enter the address where the incident occurred
statementLocation.locationRequired: Location is required to continue with your claim

statementVehicle.whichVehicle: Which vehicle was involved in the incident?
statementVehicle.selectVehicleDescription: Please select the vehicle that was involved in the incident from your registered vehicles.
statementVehicle.selectVehicleRequired: Please select a vehicle to continue with your statement.
statementVehicle.addVehicleFirst: You need to add at least one vehicle before creating a statement.

statementReview.reviewDescription: Please carefully review all the information below before submitting your statement. Once submitted, you cannot edit the details.
statementReview.editSectionDescription: This will allow you to edit the selected section
statementReview.statementCreated: Your statement has been created successfully and submitted for processing.
statementReview.errorCreating: There was an error creating your statement. Please try again.

statementCircumstances.otherDesc: Other type of incident not listed above

statementCircumstances.descriptionRequired: Please provide a detailed description of the incident.

vehiclesScreen.noVehicle: No vehicles added yet. Add your first vehicle to get started.

statementParties.selectAllInvolvedParties: Select all parties that were involved in the incident. You can add details for each party.
statementParties.driverDescription: Another vehicle driver involved in the incident
statementParties.pedestrianDescription: Person walking or crossing the street
statementParties.propertyOwnerDescription: Owner of damaged property (building, fence, etc.)
statementParties.selectPartiesRequired: Please select at least one party involved in the incident.
statementParties.addNamesFor: Please add names for the following parties
